name: Castlevania Circle of the Moon GBC Edition
name_original: Castlevania Circle of the Moon GBC Edition
description:
Enjoy playing Circle of the Moon on your Game Boy Color! well at least a tiny segment of it.

This is a for fun 'what-if' slice of gameplay only.

---

Made in Game Boy studio 3.0.3, play a small segment of the catacombs and enjoy skeletons, bats and bone pillars getting in your way as you attempt to level up and farm candles for random drops of hearts, healing potions and the knife sub weapon.

This is not a full remake but does give an example of some of the things you can do in Game Boy studio 3.0.3
